DOC.brief_summary: This phase 1/2 clinical trial goal determine whether addition investigational agent BKM120 vemurafenib lead improve 6-month progression-free survival patient BRAFV600E/K mutant melanoma .
DOC.brief_title: BKM120 Combined With Vemurafenib ( PLX4032 ) BRAFV600E/K Mutant Advanced Melanoma
